features: ADAPTABLE- Available in 4sizes (1 seat, 2 seats,3 seats,4 seats), it can adapt to most sofas. Designed using mono-elastic technology, the sofa covers 2 seater with armrests have stretchy and elasticated fabric, and are highly adaptable to different kinds of settees and couches.With about colorful and fashional patterns ,it could fit almost Home-style.Before purchasing, please be sure to measure the size of your sofa to ensure that it is within the range marked on the picture .

INSTALL & WASH This couch slipcover is very easy to install due to its highly stretchable spandex fabric and elastic bottom. Machine washable in cold water. Wash separately at gentle cycle using mild laundry detergent. Do not bleach or iron . Notice: Due to the diverse light and monitor display, the colors may slightly differ from picture and product, but according to our costumers’ shopping experience, most of our items are true to the color.

STRETCHY-Differs from those cheap and flimsy fabrics of others, This sofa cover is crafted from durable and stretchy fabric which is new upgraded, breathable, no fading, no pilling ,smooth and wrinkle free. Protect your furniture from daily stains,dust, water and scratch, ideal for families with kids and pets.Fabric made of 95% polyester fiber and 5% spandex, with high elasticity to fit your sofa smoothly and tightly .NO need to worry the quality.

AESTHETIC DESIGN: VanderHOME slipcovers are as close to custom as you can reasonably purchase. These beautiful couch covers save you money by extending the life of your sofa, make your old furniture appear brand new. Quickly and easily update the color or fabric of your existing furniture.

SERVICE-We will do our best to provide satisfactory products and services to satisfy our customers. Our goal is to let more customers recognize higher quality products. If you have any questions or concerns, please send us an email. We will reply you as soon as possible within 24 hours.
